answers.answer: Hi again Tammy - are you familiar with the website ************.com - a really good source for Type 1's especially. The author is really great and maybe can be someone you can have a dialogue with.Cheers,Joey
Thanks Joey--I am not familiar with the website. I will check it out.Tammy

Not sure how you can check out a website which has been blanked out..lol. I will send you a PM with a website with 15,000 other diabetics of both types. It's very warm and welcoming and you will find lots of support.
Not sure why it was blanked out - site is diabetesmine *******

MedHelp doesn't allow listing of sites or e-mails on the discussion board so they block all or part of the address. That's why I send sites I recommend to people by private message. That one got through enough to figure out, though!

question: I am looking for other type 1's who are willing to share their experiences. I've been a diabetic for 25 years and am currently struggling with with highs and lows. I have just started a new pump with a sensor to help head off the ups and downs.  Would love to make friends with others dealing with diabetes on a daily basis. Both Type 1 and 2.Tammy
title: Type 1 Support-Looking for others w/type 1 to share experience
